headline: To Combat Mounting Cargo Theft, Verisk Launches CargoNet® RouteScore API
summary: CargoNet’s RouteScore API bolsters cargo security with advanced, data-driven risk scoringJERSEY CITY, N.J., Jan. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cargo theft losses in the U.S. continue to climb: 2024 is projected to record 25 percent more losses than 2023, a year that also reached all-time highs for reported incidents.
